page.title: 09A VEGETABLE FARM(BROOK FARM)
page.content: This farm is of 178 acres it grows 45 acres of{lettuce,}48 acres of{cabbage, 45 acres of{spinach,}25 acres of { {spring onions,}10 acres of{leeks,}6 acres of{rhubarb,}1 acre of{radish,}4 acres of{parsley,}10 acres of{chinese {cabbage}and 1 acre of{celeriac. The farm has a staff of about 50 but this varies according to the season. The vegetables are picked, washed in a large washing shed, packed in boxes and taken to a{London}market by lorry. The lorry leaves Great Oakley every evening at 5:30 pm (except Saturday evening). There are 12 tractors a sprayer, 4 fork lifts, a refrigerator lorry and 3 landrovers.
